Machine Learning Project


by Toby Dore

For this project I downloaded an archive of 3,000 speeches from UK politicians and trained a machine learning model to distinguish between Conservative and Labour speakers.

Before training the model I stripped the speeches of obvious indicators (party name, leaders names etc) to make the classification dependant purely on the content of the text.

While not perfect, in tests the model tends to classify the speeches correctly about 80% of the time.

I've written about the project in my blog, and full details can be found on my github.
